title: (RECOVERYING A LOST ACCOUNT NOT BUYING NOR SELLING NOR ANYTHING OF THE SORT PLEASE HELP )
body:
I have a username to my brothers account ( who doesnt play that often ) and am having trouble recovering the password , is there a way to find what email account is linked to that specific username ?? any help would be appreciated.
TO BE ABSOLUTELY CLEAR CAUSE THIS POST WAS REMOVED BEFORE , i am neither buying selling or doing anything illegal with the account he just doesnt remember which email is associated with his account and would like to know which email he has to open in order to recover his password . 
the employee misunderstood me completely and banned a previous post .

replies.body: An account belongs to the person who signed up for it, so if it's your brothers then we won't be able to help recover it for you.  If your brother needs himself with this account, he can reach out to us directly to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'd be happy to help.  Account security is something we take pretty seriously, so we won't be able to help without certainty that we're corresponding with the owner.  Hope that helps clear things up.
